DOC.brief_summary: To determine optimum dose level for a single visit multidose intradermal injection of rabies vaccine with the aim to induce immunological memory in all subjects.
DOC.brief_title: One-visit Multi-site Intradermal Rabies Vaccination - Dose Finding
